com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.antispam

Class EventSpamPreventer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.antispam.EventSpamPreventer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InteractSpamPreventer, PlayerDeathSpamPreventer

    public abstract class EventSpamPreventer
extends Object
    Defines an abstract spam preventer that defines methods common to all spam-preventers. Implements basic record storage for spam preventers. Child classes are expected to create their own EventSpamRecord implementation and handle adding internal records through this class.
    Author:
    crash

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected EventSpamRecord[] records
      The buffer of internal spam records held by the spam preventer instance.
      protected static int RECORDS
      The number of internal records to keep for spam preventers.

    • Field Detail

      • RECORDS

        protected static final int RECORDS
        The number of internal records to keep for spam preventers. Default is 5.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • records

        protected final EventSpamRecord[] records
        The buffer of internal spam records held by the spam preventer instance. These are generally filled circularly by addRecord()
        See Also:
        addRecord(com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.antispam.EventSpamRecord)

    • Method Detail

      • addRecord

        protected void addRecord(EventSpamRecord record)
        Adds a record to internal (circular) storage.
        Parameters:
        record - the record to add.

      • recordEvent

        public abstract SpamResult recordEvent(org.bukkit.event.Event event)
        Records an event in internal storage and returns a spam check result. Classes implementing this method should use addRecord to add internal records and methods of their implementation of EventSpamRecord to
        Parameters:
        event - the event to record and check.
        Returns:
        the SpamResult associated with spam checks done by this method.
        See Also:
        addRecord(com.github.crashdemons.playerheads.antispam.EventSpamRecord)
